question:
Consider the following statements about National Investment Fund (NIF):
  1. The money procured through disinvestment becomes a part of National Investment Fund
  2. Department of Investment and public Asset Management (DIPAM) manages the National Investment Fund (NIF)
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. The money procured through disinvestment becomes a part of National Investment Fund. <u>Second statement is incorrect</u>. The task of policy framing on utilisation of proceeds of disinvestment moved into the National Investment Fund (NIF) is performed by Department of Economic Affairs. Earlier the same task was done by Department of Investment and Public Asset Management or DIPAM but recently the responsibility has been shifted to Department of Economic Affairs.
